en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We’re sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We’re sorry, we’ve lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We’re sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We’re sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Twitch license.
en.LOST_DLC: We’re sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.PAUSE_PROGRESS_LOST: All current progress will be lost.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_1: The Threequel to the say-anything party game! Answer the prompts and make your friends laugh… hopefully.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_2: You're a family of devils who've moved to an average suburb. Can you survive the daily torture of human life?
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_3: Enter the Scrawliseum, where characters fight over weird titles. Can you take down the heavy favorite?
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_4: Give a speech about pictures you haven't seen before. It doesn’t matter if it makes sense, it’s more fun if it doesn’t!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_5: A pop culture guessing game where nothing sounds quite right! It's a good fun time experience.
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the host.
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the music.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_1:
PICK THE GAME YOU WANT TO PLAY,
THEN LOOK FOR THE FOUR-LETTER ROOM CODE
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_2:
WITH A PHONE OR TABLET, GO TO JACKBOX.TV
USING ANY INTERNET BROWSER
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_3:
ENTER THE FOUR-LETTER ROOM CODE,
ENTER A NAME, AND PRESS PLAY. THAT’S IT!
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_4:
THE FIRST PLAYER TO CONNECT IS THE ‘VIP’
WHEN ALL PLAYERS ARE IN, THE ‘VIP’ STARTS THE GAME
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_5:
UP TO 8 PEOPLE CAN PLAY, SOMETIMES MORE.
ALL JACKBOX GAMES ARE RATED ‘T FOR TEEN’
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_6:
MANY GAMES HAVE A FAMILY-FRIENDLY MODE
ACCESSED THROUGH THE GAME’S SETTINGS MENU
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_7:
FOR INFO ON GAME SETTINGS, PLAYING REMOTELY,
AND MORE, GO TO JACKBOXGAMES.COM/HowToPlay
